title: Title scroll animation, rainbow Complete status, and card layout refinements

requirements.text: Implement vertical auto-scroll animation for manga card titles that overflow their display area. The title should start from below the visible area, scroll up slowly into view, continue scrolling until completely out of view at the top, then reset and repeat from below. The animation must pause when the user hovers over the title and resume when the mouse moves away.

quotes: i wanted the title to scroll up from below, outside of the display area, then scrolling up into view slowly, all the way up until it is also completely out of the display area before resetting and starting from below again. also it pauses when hovering over it, and resumes when moving mouse away. Have it do that if the title overflows the display area.

acceptanceCriteria: Title scrolls vertically from bottom to top only when content overflows
Animation starts with title positioned below visible area
Title scrolls continuously upward until completely out of view at top
Animation resets and repeats from bottom after title exits top
Animation pauses on mouse hover over title
Animation resumes when mouse leaves title area
No scroll animation occurs if title fits within display area

requirements.text: Apply rainbow gradient coloring to the 'Complete' status text when the Complete status is selected on manga cards.

quotes: when the 'Complete' status is selected, i want the 'Complete' text to be rainbow colored

acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Complete' displays with rainbow gradient when status is Complete
Rainbow effect applies only to Complete status, not other statuses
Rainbow gradient is visually distinct and readable

requirements.text: Reposition the bookmark icon to the top right corner and the notes icon to the bottom right corner of the manga card.

quotes: I also want the bookmark icon moved to the top right edge, and the notes icon to bottom right edge

acceptanceCriteria: Bookmark icon is positioned at top right edge of card
Notes icon is positioned at bottom right edge of card
Icons remain accessible and clickable in their new positions
Icon positioning does not overlap or obscure other card content

requirements.text: Make the status area chevron and box border invisible by matching them to the background color. Move the status area upward to create space for displaying 'chapters read/available' text centered underneath it.

quotes: I also want the chevron and the box around the status area to be invisible to match the background, also have it moved up so that you can fit the 'chapters read/available' placed centered underneath it.

acceptanceCriteria: Status area chevron is invisible (matches background)
Status area box border is invisible (matches background)
Status area is repositioned upward to create vertical space below
Chapters read/available text is displayed centered below the status area
Layout accommodates the new positioning without content overlap

constraints: Maintain existing MangaCard component structure and functionality
Preserve AutoScrollTitle component's current overflow detection logic
Do not modify read-only paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the horizontal scroll behavior or other existing animations
Modifying status options beyond visual styling of 'Complete'
Restructuring the overall card layout beyond specified icon and status repositioning
